about_the_game:
Slapstick Bosses is a heavily stylized boss fighting game, with a sole focus on gameplay and comedy. Explore the game's wacky world and all the outlandish humor it has to offer.

Each boss is completely unique, offering different playstyles throughout. What they do have in common is their 3 difficultys, ranging from challenging yet calm to blood-curdlingly difficult; as well as challenges for each, modified bosses that provide a new way to play each boss.

Each boss defeat will earn you more of the game's currecy: Bits, which can be used to buy a plethora of cosmetics. The harder the difficulty, the more bits you'll earn.

Cosmetics come in the form of heads. Both swappable and stylish, these bad boys are always worth the price.

content_descriptors.notes: Minor sexual references, Minor drug references, Censored swear words, Some blood particles.

detailed_description:
Slapstick Bosses is a heavily stylized boss fighting game, with a sole focus on gameplay and comedy. Explore the game's wacky world and all the outlandish humor it has to offer.

Each boss is completely unique, offering different playstyles throughout. What they do have in common is their 3 difficultys, ranging from challenging yet calm to blood-curdlingly difficult; as well as challenges for each, modified bosses that provide a new way to play each boss.

Each boss defeat will earn you more of the game's currecy: Bits, which can be used to buy a plethora of cosmetics. The harder the difficulty, the more bits you'll earn.

Cosmetics come in the form of heads. Both swappable and stylish, these bad boys are always worth the price.
name: Slapstick Bosses

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SoC featuring GPU with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A wacky boss fighting game with a charming and unique style, where the only goal is to beat them all! Collect Bits to unlock cool cosmetics! Can you master each boss on their hardest difficultys?
